description: GL.iNet’s Flint 3 enters the Wi-Fi 7 market with competitive specs and sub-$160 price.
title: This is the cheapest Wi-Fi 7 BE9300 VPN-aware router I could find and, thanks to four 2.5GbE LAN ports, it is probably also the best value out there

author: Efosa Udinmwen
description: Aura Ultrabook impresses with its dual-screen design and sleek build, but disappoints with a weak CPU that limits performance.

description: Freedman HealthCare apparently breached, but the company is yet to confirm the attack.

description: Nothing has confirmed that the upcoming Nothing Phone 3 won't use the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, but I don't think that's a problem.

description: Now you can create viral ChatGPT AI-generated images inside WhatsApp.

description: Users are advised to install the patch ASAP, or risk possible compromise.

description: The temporary restrictions at UNFI, and the stores it supplies, continue.

description: Wondering why your Windows 11 face login doesn’t work sometimes? It’s because of Microsoft’s recent push for ‘enhanced security’.

description: Windows 11’s new update looks like a double dose of trouble with reports of nasty bugs and serious problems installing the upgrade.

description: Wimbledon 2025 wants to use more AI than ever to win over tennis skeptics in what should be the smartest Championships yet.

description: Sony's new Bravia 8 II flagship OLED TV has arrived at a premium price. Does it have what it takes to stand up to this year's OLED competition?
